subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: By their early teens, some players with N.H.L. aspirations face a decision: stay eligible for college, or bolt to major junior hockey in Canada, which is considered professional.
snippet: By their early teens, some players with N.H.L. aspirations face a decision: stay eligible for college, or bolt to major junior hockey in Canada, which is considered professional.
